languages.text: "Забыл свое место?" {n}Голос Караэля звенит от издевки.{/n} "Эт{mf|от|а} мон-кай смеет говорить с тобой в таком тоне? Как низко надо было опуститься, чтобы..."
"Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"
languages.original_text: "Забыл свое место?" {n}Голос Караэля звенит от издевки.{/n} "Эт{mf|от|а} мон-кай смеет говорить с тобой в таком тоне? Как низко надо было опуститься, чтобы..."

traits.locale_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you mist have fallen to..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Eure Stellung vergessen?" {n}Kharaels Stimme dröhnt vor Verachtung.{/n} "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey erdreistet sich, so mit Euch zu sprechen? Wie tief müsst Ihr gesunken sein, um -"
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Stellung vergessen?" {n}Kharaels Stimme dröhnt vor Verachtung.{/n} "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey erdreistet sich, so mit Euch zu sprechen? Wie tief müsst Ihr gesunken sein, um -"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: “得意忘形？”{n}卡瑞尔的声音里流露出轻蔑之意。{/n}“这只猴子居然敢这样和你说话？你到底沦落到——”
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"

traits.locale_text: “得意忘形？”{n}卡瑞尔的声音里流露出轻蔑之意。{/n}“这只猴子居然敢这样和你说话？你到底沦落到——”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: « Vous vous oubliez ? {n}éructe Kharael d'une voix tranchante de mépris.{/n} Comment {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh ose-t-{mf|il|elle} s'adresser à vous ainsi ? Vous avez dû tomber... »
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous oubliez ? {n}éructe Kharael d'une voix tranchante de mépris.{/n} Comment {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh ose-t-{mf|il|elle} s'adresser à vous ainsi ? » Vous avez dû tomber... »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: «¿Olvidar tu lugar?». {n}El tono de Kharael está lleno de desdén.{/n} «¿Y est{mf|e|a} mon-keigh se atreve a hablarte así? Cuán bajo has tenido que caer para...».
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"

traits.locale_text: «¿Olvidar tu lugar?». {n}El tono de Kharael está lleno de desdén.{/n} «¿Y est{mf|e|a} mon-keigh se atreve a hablarte así? Cuán bajo has tenido que caer para...».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: 「立場を忘れているだと？」{n}カラエルの声は嘲るように響いている。{/n}「このモン＝ケイはそんなふうにあなたに話しかける度胸があるのか。一体どこまで落ちればそんなことが…」
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"

traits.locale_text: 「立場を忘れているだと？」{n}カラエルの声は嘲るように響いている。{/n}「このモン＝ケイはそんなふうにあなたに話しかける度胸があるのか。一体どこまで落ちればそんなことが…」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Haddini aşmak mı?" {n}Kharael'in sesi, horgörüyle çınlıyor.{/n} "Bu mon-keigh seninle bu şekilde konuşmaya nasıl cüret edebiliyor? Ne hâle gel..."
languages.original_text: "Forgetting your place?" {n}Kharael's voice is ringing with scorn.{/n} "This mon-keigh has the nerve to talk to you like that? How low you must have fallen to—"
